Message:
One day, I happened to
hear a rumor.

It’s said to be
a murderous sword,
created by Artie
with the purpose
of destroying lives.

Apparently it’s raging
out of control,
striking down
anything in its path.

No regular weapon’s
powerful enough to
destroy that evil sword.

It’s gotta be one
augmented with
even more magic power.

Artie was trying to pour
all of her magic power
into a weapon like
some kind of punishment.

But, there was no way
I was gonna let her do that.

“If that’s what
needs to be done,
my power is yours
to use, partner.”
I took Artie by the hand.

My power is yours,
and your sins are mine.”

“Besides, the two of us now
have much more power
than you had when
you were alone then.”

“We’ll quell that evil sword,
and restore peace...”

“Together, we’ll turn
our hopes into a power
that’ll bring that
destructive sword and
our sins to an end.”
